about_the_game:
INTENSE NAVAL BATTLES

The sea is rife with riches... but also with danger! Devise cunning plans to outmaneuver your enemies or be claimed by the depths.

 

SHIP CUSTOMIZATION

Equip your ship with various weapons, gadgets and mythical relics — as the captain, you get to freely design the layout of your ship. There is a vast array of equipment options to discover, and almost everything can be further modified by other equipment, creating truly powerful and ingenious synergies.

 

PLUNDER!

Barter with different factions or sink their ships for some precious loot. You might even get lucky and discover an ancient treasure map.

MASTER THE SEAS

Different ships, varying game objectives, deep sea mysteries, and a wide assortment of equipment — Roguebound Pirates is designed to be highly replayable!

 

The game is in active development. You can join Discord to share ideas & follow devlogs on YouTube.

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 570 | RX 560

short_description: Roguebound Pirates is an adventure roguelike with intense naval battles and deep ship customization. Plunder ships, search for lost treasures and create game-breaking builds to become the one true ruler of the seas.
